data.text:
@graham_brooksy Even found the best street name in Scarborough on my walk this morning 👍😁

🔴🔵🦅⚽ https://t.co/MWmaATMTi6
@OneMorePoint1 As I’m one of them so do I!

@nessa196767 I know Vanessa. You and some others not having the best time.

Keep on focusing on the stuff that is good, the stuff you can affect positively and things do turn for the better 👍

@lee_eyres Hopefully none of them too serious. 🤞Weird how it goes in waves.

Seemed to affect all 'my people' middle part of last year, ironically when the stats show it was at its lowest.

@OneMorePoint1 Pretty low times weren't they. Puts alot of things into perspective as well I think. Even now with what's going on in Ukraine. We're enjoying a golden era at Palace, something I'd never thought of seeing 10 straight season's in the Prem and hopefully another piss up at Wembley,
@OneMorePoint1 Good post.  But it is hard
@OneMorePoint1 I know of more people with COVID at the moment than at any time in those 2 years.
@OneMorePoint1 Last there to watch cricket, a real treat!
